metadata.title: Mightly Girls' Sleeveless Skater Dress | Organic Cotton Summer Clothes, Swing Dress, Cute Twirl Play Dress for Toddler&Kids
features: 95% ORGANIC COTTON / 5% SPANDEX - Mightly children’s clothes are certified to the Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS). They are imported from India and made with certified organic cotton and non-toxic dyes and inks. Our dye process results in long-lasting color that won't irritate sensitive skin. Mightly’s GOTS ID# is OT-034929.

FAIR TRADE CERTIFIED FACTORY - Fair Trade Certified factories must adhere to rigorous social, environmental and economic standards to protect the health and safety of workers. This means safe working conditions, no child or forced labor, elimination of harmful chemicals, guaranteed maternity leave, and much more. Mightly’s Fair Trade ID# is 1716500.
TAGLESS AND ITCH-FREE - No tags in our clothes means no complaints from your kids! We also use flat stitching on our seams to make sure that our clothes feel as good as they look.

PRE-SHRUNK AND MACHINE WASHABLE - Our natural-fiber fabrics have been pre-washed to eliminate most shrinkage and are durable enough to handle repeated machine washing. In fact, they get better after each wash. A girl's dress that goes from soft to super soft, yes please!

MADE FOR CHILDHOOD - Our children's clothing is made to last! That means using premium organic cotton yarn, high quality construction and just enough stretch so that kids can play in comfort. The sleeveless skater style fit and flare dress is made to be worn alone or layered over leggings. All our girls' dresses have functional side pockets. It’s a party dress, play dress and school dress in one.
description: Let your little princess run and play in comfort and style with our amazing Mightly kids dresses! This wonderful collection of girls' dresses is made with durable, long-lasting materials that are both comfortable and machine washable. Our dresses feature 95% organic cotton and 5% spandex, so your little ones can run and play freely with ease. These dresses are designed to inspire creativity and adventure, featuring a variety of styles to suit any occasion. From casual swing dresses to A-line dresses to flowy dresses, we have everything your child needs to look and feel amazing. Our dresses come in a variety of sizes, perfect for toddlers, juniors, and teens. We have dresses with beautiful floral prints, bright rainbow colors, and wonderful patterns that are perfect for birthday parties, proms, or any other special occasion. Our natural fiber design keeps these dresses lightweight and breathable, so your child can stay cool and comfortable all day long. 100% of the cotton we use is organic and our fabrics are pre-shrunk and durable enough for the washing machine. Our dresses are also designed to be easy to wear, with sleeveless pullover styles, side pockets, and comfortable stretch fabric that allows your child to move freely. Whether your child is dancing, playing, or simply exploring, our dresses are perfect for any adventure. At Mightly, we believe that every child deserves to feel happy and comfy in what they wear. Our beautiful clothing is made from natural fibers and non-toxic dyes, ensuring that your child is always safe and comfortable. So, let your child live with wonder and adventure in our beautiful and comfortable dresses.
